data.name: Sea of Choices Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Sea of Choices is the culmination of 10 years of composing music for New Orleans' own legendary musician BlueWind, who's got plenty of albums and shows under his belt. Wanting to take their music and art to the next level, BlueWind's compositions for Sea of Choices are emotionally impactful, most with a strong beat, and he has some of the sharpest melodies out there. There's no way you won't walk away without having your head nodding along to these tunes.
data.about_the_game: Sea of Choices is the culmination of 10 years of composing music for New Orleans' own legendary musician BlueWind, who's got plenty of albums and shows under his belt. Wanting to take their music and art to the next level, BlueWind's compositions for Sea of Choices are emotionally impactful, most with a strong beat, and he has some of the sharpest melodies out there. There's no way you won't walk away without having your head nodding along to these tunes.
data.short_description: The original music composed Sea of Choices is very diverse. With a heavy emphasis on beats and sharp melodies and genre-bending at every turn there's so much to take away from this soundtrack.
